front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Specifications of High Voltage Circuit Breakers (Over 1000 Volts)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: These specifications apply to all indoor and outdoor types of ac high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 volts. This document is issued only as a guide for use in compiling specifications for ac high-voltage circuit breakers. The imperative mode of the language is illustrative of that used in specifications.
